title: ils插件标签无法保存
author: 小提莫2333
txt_content:
这是ils在本论坛的搬运地址http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=518153&extra=page%3d1%26filter%3dsortid%26sortid%3d7%26searchoption%5b62%5d%5bvalue%5d%3d%25e8%2587%25aa%25e5%25ae%259a%25e4%25b9%2589%25e7%2589%25a9%25e5%2593%2581%26searchoption%5b62%5d%5btype%5d%3d
插件修改了标签名之后，用plugman重新加载插件后更改的标签恢复，求怎么解决（ps:已转码，u8和a都尝试过）
